objects.description: [BrainTest](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0293) stores a secondary Android app package (APK) in its assets directory in encrypted form, and decrypts the payload at runtime.(Citation: Lookout-BrainTest)

external_references.description: Chris Dehghanpoor. (2016, January 6). Brain Test re-emerges: 13 apps found in Google Play  Read more: Brain Test re-emerges: 13 apps found in Google Play. Retrieved December 21, 2016.
